title: Brand New 3 BD Apartment for Sale in Col. 07
details:
BRAND NEW APARTMENT FOR SALE IN COLOMBO 7

Ideal investment in the heart of Colombo!

This Apartment has 3 Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms with Maids Room & Bathroom has a floor area of 1360 and located in a mid floor with good views.

Investment is just 57 Million LKR!

The is a Brand New Complex that includes Facilities such as a small Gym, One Designated Car Park & 24/7 Security.

Please Contact: TSL Property on 0778973140 / 0766787070 / 0112677534

Interested In Buying Luxurious Apartments Situated In The Heart Of Colombo? Visit Our Website : www.tslproperty.com
